arts.ttl: Undav gives Stuttgart defence praise after Augsburg win
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart beat Augsburg 1-0 thanks to a substitute goal from injury returnee Deniz Undav in the second half. After the game, the German gave huge praise to Stuttgart's back line.

arts.ttl: Deniz Undav makes goalscoring return as Stuttgart beat Augsburg
arts.sum: Deniz Undav marked his return to Stuttgart action with the winner as The Swabians defeated Augsburg 1-0 at the WWK Arena. Stuttgart dominated possession early on and created several chances, with Ermedin Demirović coming close in the 20th minute.

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Stuttgart preview: Hosts looking to end their winless run
arts.sum: Augsburg will look to end a three-game winless run when they welcome Stuttgart to the WWK Arena for Sunday’s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Preview: Augsburg vs. Stuttgart - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and Stuttgart, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
